EmailTemplate.name: Imagine U No Show (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Missed training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
According to our records, you missed {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} on {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c}. Participation in this training is mandatory to complete the Imagine U program. Please contact mentors@imaginewa.org to discuss potential ways to catch up with program requirements.
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
